summary: "Kicki has after several years abroad returned to Sweden. Her 17-year old son has been brought up by his grandmother and has a very distant relationship to his mother. In an effort to get ... See full summary »
cast: Pernilla August|Ludwig Palmell|River Huang|Britta Andersson|Eric Tsang|Chen-Nan Tsai|Ken Lin|Hsin-yao Kuo|Gwen Yao|Kai-lin Wu|Chao-wei Wang
title: Miss Kicki
